snippet: In Mr. Stein’s new collection, “Briefly Seen,” his photographs are meant to make “the streets feel like a place where anything can happen,” he said.
abstract: Photographer Harvey Stein has been documenting life in Midtown Manhattan since 1970s; book Briefly Seen: New York Street Life displays his work from 1974 to 2014.
lead_paragraph: In Mr. Stein’s new collection, “Briefly Seen,” his photographs are meant to make “the streets feel like a place where anything can happen,” he said.

headline.main: Harvey Stein Captures Street Theater of Midtown Manhattan

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Briefly Seen: New York Street Life (Book)
